thread.title: Moeen Ali set for opening spot despite struggles in Sharjah - South Wales Guardian
thread.title_full: Moeen Ali set for opening spot despite struggles in Sharjah - South Wales Guardian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: South Wales Guardian
title: Moeen Ali set for opening spot despite struggles in Sharjah - South Wales Guardian
text:
England still appear set to promote Moeen Ali as Alastair Cook's new Test opening partner next week, despite his double failure in their final warm-up fixture against Pakistan A. Moeen mustered only 19 runs in two attempts, first against the new ball alongside Alex Hales and then when he returned to try again on the second day of the practice match in Sharjah. Coach Trevor Bayliss nonetheless confirmed it is Moeen, rather than the uncapped Hales, who is likeliest to open against Pakistan in Abu Dhabi.
 South Wales Guardian.
